QuestData.Title: Foiling the Legion's Jailbreak
QuestData.Description: High Inquisitor Raalgar has some connection to the fel here on Argus that makes him unkillable. Long ago, the naaru imprisoned him on the Arcatraz. $b$bWhen the forces of Kael'thas Sunstrider attacked the citadel, we were forced to flee on the Exodar.$b$bSome Legion prisoners escaped the Arcatraz when last the Legion invaded Azeroth, but Raalgar did not. Stop them from freeing him and I will study the source of his immortality so it can be broken. $b$bI can get you close. The rest is up to you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find High Inquisitor Raalgar before the Legion frees him.
QuestData.RewardText: You did your best, $n, but the demons won this round.$b$bIt won't take Raalgar long to gather his power to attack us. But I have learned the source of his immortality while you were gone!

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Romuul to travel to the Arcatraz
